thread.title: Doom 3 Player Height VS Quake 3 Player Height

post.author: Pectabyte
post.body: Whats the difference in Units? Quake 3 feels squatty and dwarf like in comparison to Doom 3.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: I believe 1 unit in Q1/2/3/D3 are all the same.

post.author: Zombie13
post.body:
The Happy Friar wrote:
I believe 1 unit in Q1/2/3/D3 are all the same.


Nevar.

Q3 is 56 units high and the D3 player is 64 units high.

I am dissapointed Friar

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: I thought he wanted to know what the conversion between the games was, not the character height.

post.author: Tetzlaff
post.body:
In Quake3 the player speed is way higher than in Doom3, so the player needs more space. Maybe because of this the player in Q3 is smaller compared to the environment?

For Doom3 I remember they wanted to have more realistic measurements.
